content.prompt: Which of the following was among the first results of the European Industrial Revolution in other parts of the world?

choices.label: The beginning of the transatlantic slave trade
Increased demand for commodities such as cotton and palm oil
The search for oil in Africa, Asia, and Latin America
Construction of textile factories in Africa and Asia
The partition of Africa by European imperial powers

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
